lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers have suspended forward Blake Griffin four games and will withhold his pay for an additional contest for punching an equipment manager last month, the NBA team said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Clippers Suspend Griffin Four Games for Punching Incident
headline.main: Clippers Suspend Griffin Four Games for Punching Incident

snippet: The Los Angeles Clippers have suspended forward Blake Griffin four games and will withhold his pay for an additional contest for punching an equipment manager last month, the NBA team said on Tuesday....
